roles.title: Support Manager
roles.description: Mentor a remote team of senior-level support engineers. Resolve technical escalations, build internal tools, and analyze data to continuously improve customer experience.

roles.title: Senior Customer Success Engineer
roles.description: Provided technical guidance to customers building and deploying websites. Included analyzing log files, traffic data, and site codebases, and working with site developers to optimize for scale and agility.

roles.title: Senior Developer/Tech Lead
roles.description: Agile website development for non-profits, unions, and universities. Spec writing, scoping, and full-stack CMS development using modern build tools.

company: American Public Media | Minnesota Public Radio

roles.title: Web Developer
roles.description: Architected CMS-driven solutions for multimedia content creation and syndication for public radio programs. Continuously improved Drupal website performance.

roles.title: Multimedia Designer
roles.description: Designed and developed hands-on exhibits, data visualizations, and interactive digital experiences.
